package javaro; public class Ex6_6 { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub double x, y; x = 10.00; y = 20.0; double add_value = fn_add(x, y); System.out.println("더하기=" + add_value); } public static double fn_add(double x, double y) { double result; result = x + y; return result; } }
